mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_t (sz_id, sz_email, sz_password, sz_phone, ts_created, ts_updated, nt_row_state,nt_row_version) values (#{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{szEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{szPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 1,1)
mapper.update:
update sys_user_t
sz_email = #{szEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sz_password = #{szPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sz_phone = #{szPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ts_created = #{tsCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where sz_id = #{szId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
